net.sf.hajdbc.cache.lazy

Class SharedLazyDatabaseMetaDataCache<Z,D extends Database<Z>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.hajdbc.cache.lazy.SharedLazyDatabaseMetaDataCache<Z,D>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseMetaDataCache<Z,D>

    public class SharedLazyDatabaseMetaDataCache<Z,D extends Database<Z>>
extends Object
implements DatabaseMetaDataCache<Z,D>
    DatabaseMetaDataCache implementation that lazily caches data when requested. Used when a compromise between memory usage and performance is desired. Caches DatabaseProperties using a soft reference to prevent OutOfMemoryErrors.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Paul Ferraro
